Desc.entry: A registered charity that runs a voluntary programme which aims to support adults with a history of substance misuse into constructive activities, education, training and employment. Offers to work with individuals on a one-to-one basis for up to a year. Also offers careers advice, job search and CV preparation, debt and benefit advice and support.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9am-5pm, Fri 10am-1pm (1-4pm for telephone enquiries only)
